DirectoryBatcher (autotransform.batcher.directory)

The implementation for the directory Batcher.

class autotransform.batcher.directory.DirectoryBatcher(params: autotransform.batcher.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher[autotransform.batcher.directory.DirectoryBatcherParams]

A batcher which separates FileItems by directory. Batches are given a title that is based on a prefix and the directory that the batch is using.

_params

Contains the prefix to use for constructing a title.

Type

DirectoryBatcherParams

batch(items: Sequence[autotransform.item.base.Item]) → List[autotransform.batcher.base.Batch]

Takes in a list FileItems and separates them based on their directory.

Parameters

items (Sequence[Item]) – The filtered Items to separate.

Returns

A list containing a batch for each folder containing files.

Return type

List[Batch]

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.batcher.directory.DirectoryBatcher

Produces a DirectoryBatcher from the provided data.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle

Returns

An instance of the DirectoryBatcher with the provided params.

Return type

DirectoryBatcher

static get_type() → autotransform.batcher.type.BatcherType

Used to map Batcher components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Batcher.

Return type

BatcherType

class autotransform.batcher.directory.DirectoryBatcherParams

Bases: TypedDict

The param type for a DirectoryBatcher.

metadata: typing_extensions.NotRequired[Mapping[str, Any]]
